text:
Pouring in Fillmore,
wear a raincoat and drive safely,
Work drive home with care

Music to my ears,
lofi is peaceful tonight,
Let us dance and vibe!

There's still snow up there,
should I learn skiing today?
No doubt that I will

Hi greetings student,
do you speak robot or not?,
If not it's okay!

Do you recognize?,
if not I suggest to play
It is very addictive
